room_title: Escape room "Casino Cage" by Escape AC in Atlantic City
review: Challenging experience. Escaped with a crew of 4 with 6 minutes left to spare. A bit pricey per person including some Jersey luxury tax

room_title: Escape room "Casino Cage" by Escape AC in Atlantic City
review: A few clues short of escaping. The most elaborate set design and clever challenging clues I have experienced. The best escape room experience I've had. The Cage is a must when visiting AC.

room_title: Escape room "Casino Cage" by Escape AC in Atlantic City
review: My girlfriend and I played the Casino Cage and were teamed with another group. This room was very fun and creative, it was different from a lot of escape rooms I have done recently. They made the casino cage very realistic and challenging. We'll be back for the other rooms in the future.

room_title: Escape room "Casino Cage" by Escape AC in Atlantic City
review: First time completing an Escape Room, so we had absolutely no idea on what to expect. We went with the Casino Room, made a few friends, and escaped with 12 minutes on the clock. Lots of fun and will definitely do it again!

room_title: Escape room "Casino Cage" by Escape AC in Atlantic City
review: Escape AC was a great experience. Staff was very fun to be around and explained everything clearly. Rooms were very life-like and a lot of fun. I did the Casino Cage room with my dad and were 2 minutes from getting out. The overall experience was excellent and would definitely go back for the other rooms!

room_title: Escape room "Casino Cage" by Escape AC in Atlantic City
review: This was a great time! We had the Casino Cage room for our first escape room experience. Our game master was very helpful and friendly. We didnt make it out, but we did open a bunch of locks. The game itself was cool, and it was challenging and not that hard. Wished I could have bought two hours!
